resources.string: App is inactive. \n Please tap the cross to start.
App is active and recording. \n Please tap the tick to stop.

App is active. 
Location not determined yet. 
No data is being recorded. 
 Recording will begin when your phone is on-campus.
App is active. \nYour phone is off-campus and not recording any data. \nPlease tap the tick to stop.
For this app to work, you must have GPS on

This App uses GPS to locate this device when scanning other devices. This information helps researchers build a map of other scans. If you have GPS turned off, this app will not work.\n\nPlease go to setting and turn on GPS.
